Name: Green Negroni
Ingredients: 10 ml Green Chartreuse (or alternative herbal liqueur)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of galia melon slice..
POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass.
Review: Don’t be put off or misled by the lurid green colour or this cocktail, it is both bittersweet and complex. As the name suggests it is based in a classic Negroni but with Green Chartreuse herbal complexity and a dose of rich green melon liqueur.
Nutrition: One serving of Green Negroni contains 226 calories
